title: Charity in Cheshire
description: It was the very worst of years, the year of Covid, yet for Charity, it was also the year of love.Surrounded by unimaginable luxury, Charity wakens on her twenty-eight birthday to the realization her existence is shallow. Married to millionaire coke addict Roland, Charity yearns for a life with more meaning.However, when she finally picks up the courage to take her life in a new direction a rainfall of misfortune drenches her. As she’s floundering in the depths of depression, her chauffeur Luke steps into her life. Can his stoic-calmness rescue Charity from her self-imprisoning mind?Although, raised as a Christian, Charity has long lost her belief in God. But He has never strayed far from her side. The question is - will she realize she’s not as alone as she thinks?Charity in Cheshire is a ‘riches to rags’ tale. A 2020 love story, where love and kindness mean more than all the gold in the world
author: T.N. Traynor
